mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name from t_menu where is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_menu (menu_id, menu_name, role, route, remark, version, is_deleted, create_by, gmt_create, gmt_modified, last_modified_by) values (#{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{role}, #{route}, #{remark}, 0, 0, #{createBy}, now(), now(), #{createBy})
mapper.update: update t_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, version = #{version}, remark = #{remark}, role = #{role}, route = #{route}, version = version +1, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy} where menu_id =#{menuId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select menu_name from t_menu where role >= #{role}
